name: Dust n Wheels
description: With its fuss-free gameplay, Dust n Wheels immerses you into its beautiful and challenging world of high-adrenaline racing that excites, thrills and keeps you at the edge of your seat.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64 bit or greater Processor: 2 Ghz or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512 mb video memory, Shader model 4.0+ DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Standard audio device
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64 bit or greater Processor: 3 Ghz or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 4 gb video memory, Shader model 5.0 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Standard audio device
